text: «alahi besewi layi minimi alaweredemi» balumi gize alahini tegebi kibiruni alakeberutimi፡፡ (inidihi) belachewi፡- «yanini birihanina lesewochi meri hono musa yamet’awini mets’ihafi kifilifilochi yemitaderiguti sitihonu mani aweredewi (yewededachihwatini) tigelits’watalachihu bizuwinimi tidebik’alachihu፡፡ inanitemi abatochachihumi yalawek’achihutini tesitemarachihu፤»
